title: Bug 9654: Modify Parameters - Dialog details
description: Bug 9654: Modify Parameters - Dialog details duplicated name validation could be performed on the first page. The first and second column could be merged.
OB: When changing a parameter name to something very long, the preview is cut off.
EB: The preview should display the full parameter name without being cut off.
SR:
To reproduce, follow these steps:
1. Open the Modify Parameters dialog.
2. Change a parameter name to something very long.
3. Observe the preview and notice that it is cut off.
